name: 2XU Flight Compression Socks - Unisex
description: Wear these for long-haul plane flights and arrive with fresher legs. Graduated compression increases circulation for less swelling, fatigue and stiffness.Nylon and cotton blend is soft against the skin.Seamless toe with vented panel provides breathable, chafe-free comfort.Padded zones underfoot absorb shock and add comfort.Anatomical left and right footbed for improved fit.Medium firmness 15-20mmHg graduated compression helps fend off fatigue.
